description:
Stretchy straps that look better than electrical tape, won’t mark your frame, and can be used over and over. Made from a UV stabilized polyurethane, OneUp’s EDC Gear Straps are a dead simple way to strap things to your bike.

  • 35.5cm long
  • Won’t absorb water or mud like cloth straps will
  • Buckle has and extra loop secure the strap’s tail
  • No recommended for bananas
name: OneUp EDC Gear Strap
